energy_analysis: HIGH ENERGY (1.11) - 80% high-energy dances with dramatic manual spins, 20% accent moves. All moves use 1-2 cycles maximum for variety. Zero repetition of same move back-to-back. Dramatic body_yaw rotations (±95-140°) create dynamic visual impact matching 0.91 danceability.
